Name: Alaska (Savoy recipe)
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: In his 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks , David Embury says of the Alaska, " This is also sometimes called the Oriental. It can be greatly improved by using less Chartreuse and adding 1 or 2 parts dry sherry. This is the Nome . "
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Alaska (Savoy recipe) contains 152 calories
